root.name: GET()
root.description: Makes a GET request to the server to retreive specified content. This is equivalent to typing a url into a desktop web browser and retreiving the contents of the web page. Note that you can pass parameters to the server if the file you are requesting is a script that will be executed. If the request is successful, the method will return true and the content can be retreived using the read() methods.

parameter.label: file
parameter.description: String: name of file on server to get

parameter.label: params
parameter.description: String[]: array of parameter names to pass to server

parameter.label: values
parameter.description: String[]: array of values corresponding to the names in the params array
